article_title: Blue Cross finds Affordable Care Act enrollees to be sicker
article_text:
Consumers with Blue Cross plans through ACA insurance marketplaces are sicker than people with coverage through their jobs

Data is likely to help insurers determine what kinds of premium-rate increases they might seek from state regulators

Under the law, no one can be denied coverage because of a pre-existing medical condition

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross, Affordable Care Act, enrollees, sicker, diabetes, depression, heart disease
article_metadata.description: Consumers who signed up for Blue Cross Blue Shield health plans through the Affordable Care Act’s insurance marketplaces these last two years tended to be sicker and incurred greater medical costs than people with BCBS coverage through their jobs.
article_metadata.title: Blue Cross finds Affordable Care Act enrollees to be sicker | The News Tribune
